scripts.push: git add . &&  git commit -m "New Version" && git push
scripts.create-404: node -e "require('fs').rename('index.html', '404.html', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.publish-page: (yarn create-404 && copyfiles -a -u1 dist/* . && yarn push && git checkout gh-pages-final -f && git clean -fd) || git checkout gh-pages-final -f && git clean -fd
